config.dual-dye-shulkers.title: Dual-Dye Shulkers Config
config.dual-dye-shulkers.showTooltip.too: Show custom color information in shulker box item tooltips
config.dual-dye-shulkers.topCombo.toolti: Key combo to dye the top. Click and press two keys/buttons.
config.dual-dye-shulkers.bottomCombo.too: Key combo to dye the bottom. Click and press two keys/buttons.
Enable crafting shulker boxes with dyes in a crafting table.
Enable dyeing shulker boxes by holding the key combo.
